diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Non-Langerhans histiocytoses (such as xanthogranuloma), drug eruption, viral exanthema, cutaneous sarcoidosis, arthropod bites
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The distinctive pink-yellow hue and sudden onset of the papules are highly suggestive of eruptive xanthomas, typically associated with hypertriglyceridemia. Laboratory evaluation revealed serum triglyceride levels of 3159 mg/dL, confirming significant hypertriglyceridemia, which supports the diagnosis.
